trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en mängd <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort alla objekt från samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when the list is being cleared.
trans-unit.target: Basklassen anropar den här metoden när listan rensas.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Den här implementeringen genererar den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>händelse.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A>metoden för <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>grundläggande klass.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is added or removed.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när ett objekt läggs till eller tas bort.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty and non-modifiable instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en tom och inte kan ändras av en instans av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Infogar ett objekt i samlingen med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Basklassen anropar den här metoden när ett objekt läggs till i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Den här implementeringen genererar den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>händelse.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A>metoden för <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>grundläggande klass.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where the `item` is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet där den `item` infogas.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: Objekt som ska infogas.

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort objektet med det angivna indexet i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Basklassen anropar den här metoden när ett objekt tas bort från samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Den här implementeringen genererar den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>händelse.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A>metoden för <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>grundläggande klass.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet för elementet du vill ta bort.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ersätter element med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Basklassen anropar den här metoden när ett objekt har angetts i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Den här implementeringen genererar den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>händelse.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A>metoden för <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>grundläggande klass.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to replace.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet för elementet du vill ersätta.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Det nya värdet för elementet i det angivna indexet.
